title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Epistemic Profile-Based Refutation for Scientific Knowledge Revision

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific concepts and scientific inquiry methods
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze scientific errors and refutation texts to revise their existing knowledge.
Learners can explain how to evaluate scientific evidence based on three epistemic profiles (authority, personal opinion, multiple sources).
Learners can improve learning efficiency by over 20% by utilizing refutation texts aligned with their epistemic profile.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
